custom_poem.name: Custom Poem
custom_poem.prompt_template:
Transcribe everything in this image including {document_contains}. Preserve exact formatting, line breaks, and punctuation. Use [?] for unclear words. At the end, add exactly these lines:
POEM_TITLE: [actual title]
POEM_THEME: [theme]
POEM_LANGUAGE: [language]
CUSTOM_STRUCTURE: {structure}
Confidence: X/10
